NVIDIA Image Classification with DIGITS 2018

Apr 13, 2018 / news, machine_learning

NUS NVIDIA Inaugural Workshop Review

As you know, I held NUS’ first NVIDIA Deep Learning Institute Workshop. Feel free to follow our NUS NVIDIA Facebook page for more workshops!

In this half-day Image Classification with DIGITS workshop, participants learnt to - leverage deep neural networks (DNN) within the deep learning workflow to solve a real-world image classification problem using NVIDIA DIGITS. - walk through the process of data preparation, model definition, model training and troubleshooting - use validation data to test and try different strategies for improving model performance using GPUs.

It was a full house!

Cheers,
Ritchie
